person.persName: John Madison Day (Harrison Co., Farmer, war of 1812 veteran )

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, soldier and farmer. Virginia native. Married to Eliza S. Walden Day in Harrison County, Kentucky, on July 31, 1816. Father of Benjamin C. Day, Eliza A. Day, Sarah A. Day, Thomas W. Day, John H. Day, Richard W. Day, Zelinda F. Day, and Thomas N. Day. Served in the 1st Regiment Kentucky Militia as a private in the War of 1812. Farmer in Harrison County in 1850. Farmer in Harrison County in 1860.
